channel.title: Australia on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race
channel.description: Recent content in Australia on Daytona 500 | The Great American Race

item.title: Cyclist wins Australia race despite being knocked off by Kangaroo
item.description: Australian Jay Vine wins the Tour Down Under - despite being knocked off his bike in a crash caused by a kangaroo.

item.title: Four attacks in 48 hours: How east Australia's beaches became a 'perfect storm' for sharks
item.description: Human-shark encounters in Australia are rising - but experts are keen to point out it isn’t the animals’ fault.

item.title: Heatwave warnings across Australia as millions celebrate national day
item.description: Temperatures are expected to peak on Tuesday, reaching the “high forties” in Victoria and South Australia.
